Uses of Class
heccCeptions.InvalidPassageNameException

Packages that use InvalidPassageNameException 
Package Description
oh_hecc
All these classes are used within OH-HECC (Optional Help for HECC) to do stuff basically.
oh_hecc.game_parts
This package basically holds the game parts for a HECCIN Game.
oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata
Classes that allow the metadata info for a heccin game to be edited.
oh_hecc.game_parts.passage
Classes that represent the individual passages in a Heccin Game (and also allow them to be edited)
